response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to me. Given its worth to you, I believe it would greatly benefit your endeavors. I am offering this exceptional item at a special price of $9,500. This offer is tailored to ensure that both parties receive a fair deal while maximizing the value for you. I trust this proposition aligns well with your interests and budget. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of facilitating this transaction.", "product_price": 9500}
